import React, { Component } from 'react' class Table extends Component { render() { function shuffle () { var coloc = new Array("Vivyane", "Flore", "Delaine", "Pierre", "Samy") var index = Math.floor(Math.random() * coloc.length); var participantsRestants=coloc.slice(0); var case1=[]; case1.push(participantsRestants.splice(Math.floor(Math.random()*participantsRestants.length),1)[0]); var case2=[]; case2.push(participantsRestants.splice(Math.floor(Math.random()*participantsRestants.length),1)[0]); var case3=[]; case3.push(participantsRestants.splice(Math.floor(Math.random()*participantsRestants.length),1)[0]); var case4=[]; case4.push(participantsRestants.splice(Math.floor(Math.random()*participantsRestants.length),1)[0]); var case5=[]; case5.push(participantsRestants.splice(Math.floor(Math.random()*participantsRestants.length),1)[0]); if (index == coloc.length) index = index--; localStorage.setItem('blabla', blb) let blb = document.querySelector(".blabla"); blb.innerHTML = ` Salon ${case1} ${case2} ${case3} Cuisine ${case5} ${case1} ${case2} Palier ${case2} ${case4} ${case1} Toilette ${case3} ${case5} ${case4} Salle de bain ${case4} ${case3} ${case5} ` console.log(coloc[index]); console.log('---------------------------------------'); console.log(coloc); console.log('---------------------------------------'); console.log(index); console.log('---------------------------------------'); } document.querySelector(".button").addEventListener("click", shuffle); return (
